about_the_game:
Egypt: Old Kingdom - Master of History might be the most unusual DLC you have ever discovered. We heed the community’s critique and reinvented the game anew, presenting the opportunity to forego every possible constraint. Play away and develop your state and technologies endlessly. Turn off the trials and events. Add more enemies - Sea peoples, mummies, and even aliens! Create the history, as you wish, according to your own tastes. It’s your history and you are the Master!

Endless Game

No more restraints! With the endless mode you can continue the game after the 300 turn and to test your talents battling new enemies. Will you be able to get to turn 400?

Customizable micromanagement

Do you like to build and develop a city? Or would you rather focus on the global events? It’s all in your hands - adjust the amount of micromanagement and play the game the way you like it!

Crazy Egypt

No, it’s not Halloween yet - we simply added a few absolutely crazy modes. Will you be able to defeat zombie-mummies or free Egypt from the alien yoke? You’ll never know until you try!
detailed_description:
Egypt: Old Kingdom - Master of History might be the most unusual DLC you have ever discovered. We heed the community’s critique and reinvented the game anew, presenting the opportunity to forego every possible constraint. Play away and develop your state and technologies endlessly. Turn off the trials and events. Add more enemies - Sea peoples, mummies, and even aliens! Create the history, as you wish, according to your own tastes. It’s your history and you are the Master!

Endless Game

No more restraints! With the endless mode you can continue the game after the 300 turn and to test your talents battling new enemies. Will you be able to get to turn 400?

Customizable micromanagement

Do you like to build and develop a city? Or would you rather focus on the global events? It’s all in your hands - adjust the amount of micromanagement and play the game the way you like it!

Crazy Egypt

No, it’s not Halloween yet - we simply added a few absolutely crazy modes. Will you be able to defeat zombie-mummies or free Egypt from the alien yoke? You’ll never know until you try!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 1.8 Ghz or AMD Athlon X2 64 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD analogues
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.9.5
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024х768, 512 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.10
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920х1080, 1 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Egypt: Old Kingdom - Master of History

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista SP2
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 1.8 Ghz or AMD Athlon X2 64 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024х768, 512 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD analogues
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920х1080, 1 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Egypt: Old Kingdom - Master of History might be the most unusual DLC you have ever discovered. No more restrictions on how to develop your state or your technologies. Create your own history the way you like it. It is your own history and you are the Master!
supported_languages: English, Russian, Simplified Chinese, German, French, Turkish, Italian, Portuguese - Brazil
